plot: Chise Hatori is 15-year-old orphan. She has no relatives, means, or hopes when a demonic sorcerer who can't become human buys her. He states that Chise will now be his apprentice and bride. (from manga)
ending_theme: "Tsuki no Mō Hanbun" (The Moon is Already a Half Moon) by AIKI&AKINO from Bless4
"The Legend of The Ancient Magus Bride" by Jessica (ep 24)
